## Extension.CompilerPlugin.apply property

Compiler plugin `apply` method

Signature:

```typescript
apply?: CallableFunction;
```

## Remarks

This function makes the [Extension.Module](/api/bud-framework/extension/module) interoperable with the Webpack plugin interface
